sentences.en: a challenging and rewarding career as a teacher
sentences.cn: 富有挑战性且有意义的教师职业

sentences.en: Any trawl through the band's interviews will reveal statements that are challenging and incisive.
sentences.cn: 随便选取一段对该乐队的访谈都能发现令人深思、犀利精辟的言论.

sentences.en: He left a note at the scene of the crime, challenging detectives to catch him.
sentences.cn: 他在犯罪现场留了个条儿，向警探挑衅。

sentences.en: I'm ready to do all those things which are more challenging.
sentences.cn: 我愿意接受更大的挑战。

sentences.en: Many enjoy the mental stimulation of a challenging job.
sentences.cn: 很多人喜欢富有挑战性的工作所带来的强烈的精神刺激。

sentences.en: Mike found a challenging job as a computer programmer.
sentences.cn: 迈克找到一份做计算机程序员的富有挑战性的工作。

sentences.en: Mona gave him a challenging look.
sentences.cn: 莫娜挑衅地看了他一眼。

sentences.en: Most of the discussion was on what needed to be done now as we transitioned from the security issues to the challenging economic issues.
sentences.cn: 随着我们由安全议题转向具有挑战性的经济议题，讨论最多的就是目前需要做些什么。

sentences.en: On PC, the game had it all — imaginative storyline and characters, challenging gameplay, superb graphics.
sentences.cn: 个人电脑里的游戏非常完美，从想象力丰富的故事情节及人物到富有挑战性的游戏设计和精美画面，应有尽有。

sentences.en: Scientists in search of a challenging career could do worse than consider forensic science.
sentences.cn: 寻求富有挑战性的事业的科学家不妨考虑一下法医学。

sentences.en: Teaching young children is a challenging and rewarding job.
sentences.cn: 幼儿教育是一项具有挑战性和有意义的工作。

sentences.en: The new current affairs series promises to address challenging issues with freshness and rigour.
sentences.cn: 新的时事系列节目承诺以全新的视角和严谨的态度谈论有挑战性的问题。

sentences.en: The new play poses some challenging questions.
sentences.cn: 这出新戏提出了一些富有挑战性的问题.

sentences.en: Try tennis, badminton or windsurfing. In short, anything challenging.
sentences.cn: 试试网球、羽毛球或帆板运动吧。总之，只要是有挑战性的。

sentences.en: We have changed the course to make it more challenging.
sentences.cn: 我们改了课程以使其更具挑战性.

sentences.en: Weber is challenging his audience to question their own beliefs.
sentences.cn: 韦伯正要求观众们反思质疑各自的信仰。
